name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: StylerGPT: ChatGPT Extension for Themes, Fonts & Backgrounds

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your ChatGPT interface with themes, fonts, and backgrounds using this ChatGPT extension. Enhance with Power-Ups!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's time to give your ChatGPT interface a fresh look with StylerGPT - The Ultimate ChatGPT Extension 🎉

⚠️ IMPORTANT NOTICE

  If StylerGPT encounters issues (typically after a major ChatGPT layout update), there's no need to uninstall. Simply open the side panel and pause StylerGPT from the Settings. It will automatically re-enable after the next update.

🟢 Why choose StylerGPT for your ChatGPT?

  We created StylerGPT to make your interaction with AI uniquely yours. While ChatGPT provides powerful capabilities, its standard interface doesnt cater to everyone's personal style. StylerGPT, the premier ChatGPT extension, allows you to customize every aspect of your ChatGPT interface, transforming it into a personalized workspace that reflects your individuality.

🟢 Benefits of using StylerGPT

  Your AI experience should be as distinctive as you are! StylerGPT is the ultimate ChatGPT extension that turns your ChatGPT interface into a personalized canvas. Tired of the default look? Ignite your creativity with vibrant colors, stunning backgrounds, and a vast selection of fonts. Fully compatible with the latest ChatGPT features, including ChatGPT Search, ChatGPT Canvas, and more.

🟢 Key features of StylerGPT

  ⌨️ Quick Access: Easily access StylerGPT settings with a dedicated button in the ChatGPT header or use the Ctrl/Cmd + Alt + S shortcut.

  🎨 Custom Appearance: Choose from 20 light/dark color schemes or create your own with our intuitive color picker.

  🌈 Colors & Gradients: Personalize your ChatGPT background with unlimited solid colors or beautiful gradients using our gradient generator.

  🖼️ Backgrounds: Select from 200+ stunning images or upload your own to make your ChatGPT interface uniquely yours.

  💬 Chat Bubbles: Customize the colors of user inputs and ChatGPT responses with endless options. Expand to a widescreen format for a more comfortable conversation view.

  🔤 Typography: Adjust font sizes and choose from approximately 100 font families for ChatGPT responses to improve readability.

  📏 Widescreen Mode: Enjoy a broader ChatGPT window, choosing your favourite chat bubbles width, reducing the need for scrolling and enhancing your viewing experience.

  🌟 Premium Themes: Access 90+ premium themes designed for both light and dark modes to suit any preference.

🟢 Exclusive Power-ups (Premium Only)

  📂 Message Navigator: Seamlessly navigate through your ChatGPT conversations with easy-to-use buttons, allowing quick access to past messages.

  🔄 Background Rotation: Keep your ChatGPT interface fresh by rotating backgrounds at your preferred intervals.

  📚 Prompt History: Automatically save your ChatGPT prompts and navigate through your history using the up and down arrow keys directly in the textarea.

  🎥 YouTube Summarizer: Instantly summarize YouTube videos using ChatGPT with a single click, adding a convenient button beneath each YouTube video.

🟢 How to get started with StylerGPT

  1️⃣ Install the StylerGPT extension from the Chrome Web Store.
  2️⃣ Pin the extension to your browser toolbar for easy access.
  3️⃣ Click the StylerGPT icon in your toolbar.
  4️⃣ Start customizing your ChatGPT interface to match your unique style!

StylerGPT isn't just another ChatGPT extension – its a complete ChatGPT experience tailored to you.

🚀 Upgrade Your ChatGPT UI Today! Experience a superior ChatGPT interface that aligns with your personal style, powered by this feature-rich ChatGPT extension.
